title: Sequence Memory
description: Watch the sequence of colors light up, then repeat it from memory!

levels.title: Easy (4 Colors)
levels.description: Start with 4 colors — how long a sequence can you remember?

levels.title: Medium (5 Colors)
levels.description: 5 colors make it trickier — stay focused!

levels.title: Hard (6 Colors)
levels.description: 6 colors and longer sequences — a real memory challenge!
